item.title: Police Chief Leads Night-Time Vehicle Checks at Gadwalâ€™s YSR Chowk
item.description:
<![CDATA[-Advertisement-
Gadwal: On Tuesday night, District Superintendent of Police T. Srinivasa Rao led a major vehicle checking operation at YSR Chowk in Gadwal town. This effort involved 40 police officers and staff, aiming to enhance visible policing.
Police checked vehicle documents, conducted breathalyzer tests, and monitored traffic rule violations during the inspection.
- Advertisement -
The SP explained to the media that these checks were part of regular Law & Order coordination. They focus...]]>

item.title: Gadwal Congress Members Ask for Justice and Recognition; Submit Petition to TPCC Leader
item.description:
<![CDATA[-Advertisement-
Gadwal: Senior Congress leaders and party members from the Gadwal Assembly Constituency have urged TPCC President Bomma Mahesh Kumar Goud to address growing dissatisfaction among local Congress workers.
During a significant meeting on July 21, 2025, the group submitted a petition highlighting neglect and unfair treatment of loyal Congress members in Gadwal. Over 5,000 members from the town and nearby areas attended, pushing for recognition and justice.
- Advertisement -
